sourcesContent: import React from 'react' import axios from 'axios' import classes from './PlayerSection.module.css' class PlayerSection extends React.Component { state = { id : 1, data : '' } componentDidUpdate(prevProps, prevState, snapshot) { let vid = this.props.match.params.vid this.setState({id : vid}) axios.get(`https://5d76bf96515d1a0014085cf9.mockapi.io/video/${this.state.id}`) .then((response) => { console.log(response.data) this.setState({ data : response.data }) }) } render() { console.log(this.props.match.params.vid) return (
